name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes:
**Note 1:**  Islets of Langerhans are distributed throughout the pancreas; an islet tumor is coded to the subsite of the pancreas in which the tumor arises if the information is available.

**Note 2:** Code regional (code 200) for contiguous extension of tumor from the site of origin.  Discontinuous involvement is coded in SEER Mets.
rows:
Localized only

    Invasive tumor confined to pancreas

    Localized, NOS

Regional by direct extension only

    Adjacent large vessel(s)
    Ampulla of Vater
    Colon
    Duodenum
    Extrahepatic bile duct(s)
    Peripancreatic tissue
    Spleen
   Stomach

Aorta
Celiac artery
Superior mesenteric artery
Tumor is inseparable from the celiac axis or superior mesenteric artery 

Stated as T3 or T4

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record
